core_msgbox_aero_failure:
Failed to enable Aero.

It looks like Windows is preventing Aero from being enabled, unfortunately it is an important requirement and Wallpaper Engine cannot work without it.

Try to enable Aero in the Windows theme options directly and start Wallpaper Engine again.
